item.title: Hemlock plant growing here last year, 2nd January
item.description:
In spite of the Greenwich Fix My Street website saying that this issue had been resolved, in fact the poisonous plant remained growing here until well into the autumn of 2025. The hemlock was beginning to set seed and was about to spread more widely, but at that point a resident of the street removed it (wearing protective gloves) and disposed of it in a black rubbish sack. Perhaps Fix My Street is not an effective place to report weeding issues.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mereworth Drive, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New lamppost broken in two - knocked over by car, 2nd January
item.description:

item.title: Significant Dip, 2nd January
